thread.title: Franz W
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Franz W

author: Franz W
title: Franz W
text: My wife and I love our furniture. Yesterday our living room sofas and love seat were delivered. We had previously bought a dining table and chairs. Home Zone products are beautifully crafted products priced exceptionally well; the tracking and delivery are excellent. Great service from an honest and reliable business!
